title: Promotion and Advancement Policies for Reservists
description: Aligned with Executive Order 212, this policy provides the promotion guidelines for reservists based on merit, time-in-grade, training completion, and unit performance. All promotions must be processed with valid orders and approved by higher headquarters.
content: This policy was uploaded as a file. Please refer to the attached document.

title: Recruitment and Enlistment Policies for Reservists
description: This policy outlines the standardized recruitment and enlistment procedures for the 301st RRIBn, ensuring that all applicants meet the physical, moral, and educational requirements. It supports inclusive practices while maintaining high standards of military readiness and character.
content: This policy was uploaded as a file. Please refer to the attached document.
